column4: How do I check link speed again? I Can't remember how to see that with ip.
And dmesg isn't telling me anything useful.
Hnnh. Maybe I was running the hand-rolled 3.2 kernel. I have no success with that card now.
Link speed is 10mbps, according to NetworkManager
and I can't get a DHCP lease.
the "flakey" card is not. It's an onboard NiC.
I have a PCIE Intel nic that works wonderfully.
check if bringing the nic up and down a few times manual does anything
Okay. I just came in here for policykit help, but I figured out that myself. :)
Bringing the Realtek nic up and down twice made it work.
heh nice :) used to help me 2
anything you want me to try while I'm here?
